data.name: Amérian Executive Mendoza Hotel
Argentino Hotel
data.description: Located in the city of Mendoza´s heart, the Hotel Argentino raises his face to the Plaza Independencia, the main square of the city. Legendary and traditional, the Argentino Hotel retains the reasons why it became the small hotel chosen by all visitors to Mendoza. Its primary mission, passenger service, turns your stay in comfort and optimizes your available time. A few steps away is the prestigious Independencia Theater, and by the area you can find the most recommended restaurants, famous cafes and major shopping stores. A few minute walk brings you to the General San Martin Park. It is 20 minutes from Francisco Gabrielli Airport and only 10 of the bus terminal. Your stay there will be an experience beyond its category and a smart choice.

data.address: Av. Gral. Güemes Sur 154, 4427 Cafayate, Salta, Argentina
data.name: Asturias Hotel Cafayate
data.description: The Asturias Hotel, categorized as 3 star, is located in Cafayate, Department of the Province of Salta. It has a privileged location, just 50 meters from the main square, near the Cathedral and the Wine Museum. From the terrace you have a magnificent view of hills and vineyards caracterÃsticos area calchaquíes valleys. Asturias Hotel rooms have views of downtown Cafayate, the garden and pool, overlooking the mountains or inner courtyards. Some rooms according to their location have balconies. Facilities include a restaurant, pool, spa and gym.

data.name: Hotel Bristol
data.description: This hotel is located in a privileged area of the city of Buenos Aires, a few metres from the Avenida 9 de Julio and Avenida Corrientes, the main gastronomic and entertainment street. This elegant and comfortable hotel opened its doors to the public in 1949 on the most important avenue of the city, opposite the greatest landmark in Buenos Aires, the Obelisk, with its unique architectural style and decoration.

data.name: Cacique Inacayal Hotel & Spa
data.description:
Cacique Incayal Lake Hotel & Spa sits on the shores of Lake Nahuel Huapi in the center of the city of San Carlos de Bariloche. Its prime location offers guests magnificent views of the lake.

The hotel has elegant guest rooms featuring designer furniture, WIFI, a mini bar, TV, digital safe and modern bathroom. There are a range of room types to accommodate the various needs of travellers.

Guests at Cacique Incayal can dine at Utrac – a restaurant serving Patagonian international and regional cuisine. It has a wine cellar with a wide range of wines from popular wineries in Argentina. Tecka Bar is another great option where you can take a tour of different international cuisines, mainly eastern tastings. Lobby Bar is an alternative to relax and enjoy excellent drinks at the fireplace overlooking the lake.

The spa and fitness area features a heated pool, gym, whirlpool, dry sauna, Finnish and Scottish shower bathrooms, and a terrace with chairs. Spa programs include massages, body treatments and facials.

data.name: CasaSur Bellini Hotel
data.description:
CasaSur Bellini Hotel is located in the heart of Palermo, one of the most distinguished areas of Buenos Aires. Neighbor of upscale art galleries, renowned shopping centers, parks and tours. It is an area that sets the trend for the bars and restaurants surrounding it, without losing the atmosphere of warmth and relaxation that will make you feel at home.

All 80 individually decorated rooms feature free Wi-Fi and pillow top beds. Guests can enjoy jetted tubs, and other standard amenities include kitchenettes with refrigerators and dishwashers. Along with a full-service spa, this smoke-free hotel has a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Free buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, a health club, a fitness center, and spa services are onsite.
